en.title: MemoryRoots
en.description: Don Lucho wonders across his own mind, searching for fragments of his family'smemories while running from for oblivion

en.title: CapybaraIsland
en.description: Explore this unique island, decorate and have fun with your Capybara friends. This clicker game is all about collecting love and developing your island while accomplishing missions and admiring the cute animals

en.title: Interactive Photoboot
en.description: Do you want to take a picture with effects, this website allows you to create photobooth images with multiple effects. It also explores the interaction using hand tracking

en.title: Supaykuna
en.description: Beat 'em up 2D adventure with pixel art that will take you to the Andean mythology and magical towns to collect kamaquen
